function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased charitable giving","Impact":"Reduction in funding for essential services and causes","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, increased government support, and diversification of funding sources","Technologies":"Fundraising platforms, donation matching programs, and digital marketing tools","People":"Non-profit organizations, charitable foundations, and individuals in need","Owner":"Non-profit organizations, government agencies, and fundraising platforms"},{"Description":"Increase in local opportunity cost for PCA-adjacent communities","Impact":"Economic collapse and endangered livelihoods in communities reliant on international tourism","Mitigation":"Diversification of local economies, support for alternative livelihoods, and sustainable tourism initiatives","Technologies":"Community development programs, sustainable tourism apps, and economic diversification tools","People":"Local authorities, businesses, and communities reliant on international tourism","Owner":"Local authorities, conservation organizations, and community development agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of economic recovery responses on PCAs","Impact":"Increased pressure on protected and conserved areas from unsustainable land and resource uses","Mitigation":"Targeted conservation funding, sustainable economic stimulus investments, and monitoring of resource use","Technologies":"Satellite monitoring systems, conservation finance platforms, and sustainable resource management tools","People":"Conservation organizations, local communities, and governments","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government agencies, and economic stimulus agencies"}]}
